rukus.text: Has the story reached you of the honored guests of Abraham
Behold, they entered his presence and said, “Peace.” He said, “Peace.” And thought, “These seem unusual.”
Then he turned quickly to his household, and brought out a fattened calf
And placed it before them. He said, “Will you not eat?”
Then he conceived a fear of them. They said, “Fear not.” And they gave him good news of a son endowed with knowledge
But his wife came forward laughing aloud. She held her forehead and said, “A barren old woman.”
They said, “Even so, your Lord has spoken, and He is Full of Wisdom and Knowledge.” 30 (End of Part)
He said, “And what, O messengers, is your mission?”
They said, “We have been sent to a people in sin
“And to bring on stones of clay
“Marked by your Lord, for those who trespass beyond bounds.”
Then We saved those believers who were there
But We did not find there any just muslim, except in one house
And We left there a sign for those who fear the terrible penalty
And in Moses was another sign. Behold, We sent him to Pharaoh with clear authority
But Pharaoh turned back with his advisors and said, “A liar, or one possessed.”
So We led him and his forces, and cast them into the sea, and the blame was his
And the ‘Ad was another sign. Behold, We sent against them the devastating wind
It left nothing that it came up against. It reduced it to ruin
And the Thamud was another sign. Behold, they were told, “Enjoy yourselves for a little while.”
But they rebelled against the command of their Lord. So the stunning noise seized them, even while they looked on
Then they could not stand, nor could they help themselves
So were the people of Noah before them, for they wickedly transgressed
